text:
@JoeBiden One candidate for president advocates wearing a mask as a sensible precaution against #COVID19. The other guy advocates ingesting disinfectant and UV tanning rays 😳
Who to vote for? Choices, choices?! 🤔 https://t.co/WMi6LRhd2i
